# SessionStellar JS

> Quality gate for AI orchestration â€” score sessions programmatically, in CI/CD, or from any MCP client.

SessionStellar parses AI session transcripts and computes scores across 5 weighted metrics. It runs entirely offline with zero network dependencies.

## Packages

- @sessionstellar/core: Scoring engine and parser. npm install @sessionstellar/core
- sessionstellar: CLI for terminal, CI/CD, and git hooks. npx sessionstellar score session.md
- @sessionstellar/mcp: MCP server for Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf. npx @sessionstellar/mcp

## Quick Start

```typescript
import { parseSessionFile, ScoringEngine } from '@sessionstellar/core';

const signals = parseSessionFile(content, 'session.md');
const score = await ScoringEngine.score(signals, crypto.randomUUID());
console.log(score.overallScore); // 0-100
```

## Metrics

- Skill Diversity (20%): Range of tools and skills invoked relative to task complexity
- Decision Depth (25%): Quality and quantity of explicit architectural decisions
- Error Recovery (20%): How errors are caught, diagnosed, and resolved
- Compound Learning (20%): Patterns recognized and applied across the session
- Orchestration Mastery (15%): Effective use of agents and sub-processes

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/sunnypatneedi/sessionstellar-js
- Web app: https://sessionstellar.com
- npm (core): https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sessionstellar/core
- npm (cli): https://www.npmjs.com/package/sessionstellar
- npm (mcp): https://www.npmjs.com/package/@sessionstellar/mcp
- Cursor plugin: https://github.com/sunnypatneedi/sessionstellar-cursor
